law.catch_line: In this section, "farm truck" means a farm vehicle that:...

text.section:
In this section, "farm truck" means a farm vehicle that:
Is a Class E (truck) vehicle; and
Has a shipping weight of its chassis and battery, as certified by the manufacturer, of more than 3/4 ton.

On application, the Administration shall issue a Class E "farm truck registration" to any applicant who certifies:
That the applicant is a farmer; and
That the vehicle for which the application is made is a farm truck, specifying its proposed use.
For each vehicle registered under this section, the annual registration fee is based on the maximum gross vehicle weight, as follows:

Except as provided in § 8-602(c) of this article, a vehicle registered under this section may not be used:
For hire except to haul farm products for another farmer; or
In any manner other than as a farm truck.
